alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern White and northwestern Gallatin Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 745 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Norris City, or 10 miles northeast of Eldorado, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern White and northwestern Gallatin Counties, including the following locations... Omaha. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
